reviews.review_msg: Kathleen really cares about her students and is receptive to feedback. Her midterms were fair but a bit long so she scaled it. Final was very fair with multiple choice and list of short answer questions which you were allowed to pick from. She is a tough marker for papers, but is more than willing to provide feedback before the due date.

I have taken BISC 333, 302,&403 with her, I will take any class that she teaches.  She does expect that her student effort, and there can be a lot of memorizinf, but she is very willing to help anyone understand anything.  These courses require students to study, so be ready to do work, but her lectures are informative and clear. shes a great prof!
